attributes.action: Make dog theft a prison sentence and more if they abuse/hurt the animals
attributes.additional_details: Also ban them from having or going near any animals. This is a big thing going on in the country right now and it is heartbreaking.
attributes.background: To give dog thieves a minimum 10 years in prison and if they hurt or abuse them a minimum of 15 years. If they are foreigners then to be deported back to their country.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560216
